rules_text:
Undead creature cards in your graveyard have unearth {1}{B}{G}. [i](Skeletons, Spirits, Vampires, Wraiths, and Zombies are undead creatures.)[/i]
Whenever another undead creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {1}{WB}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Whenever an undead creature card leaves your graveyard, you may pay {1}{BG}. If you do, non-undead creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
